name: Tales of Brazil
description:
IT IS YOUR OPPORTUNITY TO REDEEM YOURSELF

This time in Tales of Brazil, we play as Bradador, a creature from the Brazilian Folklore that is trying to find 7 Marys, however everyone is scared of him and already know that he is after the Mary and in an attempt to protect her the whole tribe guards her by patrolling the area around her. As the Bradador you can't kill all the tribe members, you are trying to redeem yourself after all, so you have to sneak past the enemies and only kill or consume the required enemies to stay alive. The enemies are scared of you, but be careful, you only have one chance to end your suffering

Original Bradador Tale

Play as the Bradador, a creature that was once a real sinnful man, responsible for many deaths and torture of various people, even including his own family ... some even say he used to beat and seriously mistreat his own mother. The Bradador then die, but God didn't want him on Heaven, the Devil didn't want him on Hell either and the own land he is buried on, rejects him every friday the 13th, starting at midnight and taking him back at sun rise. Bradador skin is rotten because some mystic force is keeping him going despite all the bugs and worms crawling inside and under his skin. The only way for him to rest in peace is to get blessed by Marys.

Features

• Based on a Brazilian Folklore Tale

• Played as the Monster Instead of Victim, usually people empathise with the victim, in this case you can be the villain of a traditional tale

• New Perspective on the Story, get closer to experiencing  what being a decaying monster with a limited time frame to achieve its goal 

• The main mechanic, consuming the enemies, is something unusual in general and specially in this game genre

Controls

WASD - Move Around

Mouse - Look Around and Hover on the Menus

LMB - Consume, Interact with Mary and the Menus

E - Drink the Potion (Health Pack)
